text: Manuel Pino is a professor at Scottsdale Community College in Arizona. Opposition to uranium mining has played a big role in Pino's life. He has written about The Destructive Impact of Uranium Mining on Native American Culture. He has spoken out at many international conferences about victims of uranium mining, depleted uranium, and associated cancer deaths. In 2008, Manuel Pino received the Nuclear-Free Future Award. ==Related pages== *Uranium in the environment *Anti-nuclear movement in the United States *Jacqui Katona ==References== ==Other websites== *Uranium Mining and Indigenous People *Indigenous Leaders Call For End To Uranium Mining Category:Environment Category:Energy
title: Manuel Pino
